g.title: MN-24-activity-diagram

a.text: High level process of purification of the mind

g.title: Purity in terms of virtue
has requisites for Jhana?
Purity in terms of virtue->has requisites for Jhana?
Purity in terms of mind
has requisites to awaken to truths?
g.text: has requisites to awaken to truths?

g.title: Purity in terms of mind->has requisites to awaken to truths?
Purity in terms of view
has requisites for Gotami's practices?
Purity in terms of view->has requisites for Gotami's practices?
Purity in terms of overcoming perplexity
g.text: Purity in terms of overcoming perplexity

g.title: has requisites for contemplative practices?
Purity in terms of overcoming perplexity->has requisites for contemplative practices?
Purity in terms of knowledge & vision of what is & is not the path
g.text: Purity in terms of knowledge & vision of what is & is not the path

g.title: has requisites for a noble eightfold path practices?
g.text: has requisites for a noble eightfold path practices?

g.title: Purity in terms of knowledge & vision of what is & is not the path->has requisites for a noble eightfold path practices?
Purity in terms of knowledge & vision of the way
g.text: Purity in terms of knowledge & vision of the way

g.title: has requisites for higher knowledges?
Purity in terms of knowledge & vision of the way->has requisites for higher knowledges?
Purity in terms of knowledge & vision
g.text: Purity in terms of knowledge & vision
practices the four bases of power

g.title: Unbinding
Purity in terms of knowledge & vision->Unbinding
Beginningless past
Beginningless past->Purity in terms of virtue
has requisites for Jhana?->Purity in terms of virtue
has requisites for Jhana?->Purity in terms of mind
has requisites to awaken to truths?->Purity in terms of virtue
has requisites to awaken to truths?->Purity in terms of view
has requisites for Gotami's practices?->Purity in terms of virtue
has requisites for Gotami's practices?->Purity in terms of overcoming perplexity
has requisites for contemplative practices?->Purity in terms of virtue
has requisites for contemplative practices?->Purity in terms of knowledge & vision of what is & is not the path
has requisites for a noble eightfold path practices?->Purity in terms of virtue
has requisites for a noble eightfold path practices?->Purity in terms of knowledge & vision of the way
has requisites for higher knowledges?->Purity in terms of virtue
has requisites for higher knowledges?->Purity in terms of knowledge & vision
Extinguishment
